title: Token collections to export
description: List of token collection names to export (e.g., primitive, semantic). Each collection will generate a separate .kt file.

title: Folder name
description: Name of the folder where .kt files will be generated.

title: File names mapping
description: Mapping of collection names to .kt file names (without extension).

title: Object names mapping
description: Mapping of collection names to Kotlin object names.

title: Enable theme template support
description: Generate interface + themed implementations for semantic tokens. When enabled, primitives become objects and semantics become interface + themed implementations.

title: Interface file name
description: Name of the interface file (without .kt extension).

title: Property annotation
description: Annotation to add to interface properties (e.g., @DesignPropertyV2).

title: Interface collections filter
description: Token collections to include in the interface file (e.g., semantic). All specified collections will be combined into one interface.

title: Theme token collections filter
description: Token collections to include in themed implementation files (e.g., semantic).

title: Theme file names mapping
description: Mapping of collection names to base file names for themed implementations (theme name will be appended).

title: Theme object names mapping
description: Mapping of collection names to Kotlin object names for themed implementations.

title: Theme folder name
description: Name of the folder where themed implementation files will be generated.

title: Theme object extends
description: Name of the interface/class that theme objects extend (e.g., ColorScheme).

title: Write back property names
description: Save generated property names back to tokens as a custom property.

title: Custom property name
description: Name of the custom property where generated property names will be saved.
